# Untainted Project Documentation for LLMs

The following files provide the most token-efficient context for this project:

- Core Context: .agent/project_context.md (Start here)
- Architecture: docs/ARCHITECTURE.md
- Database Schema: supabase/migrations/ (Read latest SQL file)
- API Definition: backend/app.py (FastAPI routes)

## Quick Orientation
This is a Next.js + FastAPI project.
- Frontend logic is in `landing-page/`.
- Backend logic is in `backend/`.
- We prioritize robust typing (TypeScript/Pydantic).
